text:
February 4, 1958
Hr* Raymond D* Cheydleur
Assistant Director
Radio Station WFSU
Florida Stats University
Tallahassee, Florida
Dear Ray:
Z just dropped a line to Harry re your letter of
the 29th and sods other natters* I have no idea about
funds* My reaction is that this is not as important
as, let-us-say, grants-in-aid but that if money is
available X believe it would be a good gesture*
X assume that you received Harold Hill's letter
of the 31st also so we shall see*
Colder than the devil in Iowa today* Wish X was
down in sunny (?) Florida*
Best,
Sam L* Becker
Director, Division of
Television-Radio-Film
SLBsmw
